title: #26: The Bill of Rights & Wrongs | Daniel Brigman from The Power Hour
description:
There is an old saying that trading away your rights in exchange for a little security will leave you with neither. Never has that been more relevant than right now in this country with the Covid-19 scamdemic.

Daniel Brigman, the host of the nationally syndicated daily radio show “The Power Hour”, explains what happens to a society when their government uses fear and the threat of arrest to condition the public into accepting more restrictions of their ability to travel, work, interact, and just to survive during these strange days.

Join us for a deep dive into the Bill of Rights and Wrongs, how bad things are right now, and where America is heading with Daniel Brigman.
